similar.title: Axis Bank appoints Neeraj Gambhir as executive director
similar.description: Axis Bank has announced the appointment of Neeraj Gambhir as an executive director, effective August 4, 2025. Gambhir, currently Group Executive – Treasury, Markets and Wholesale banking products, brings over 30 years of experience in the financial sector. He has held leadership positions at Nomura, Lehman Brothers, and ICICI Bank, demonstrating his extensive expertise.
